CmdLine: apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y software-properties-common &&   echo oracle-java8-installer shared/accepted-oracle-license-v1-1 select true | debconf-set-selections &&   add-apt-repository -y ppa:webupd8team/java &&   apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y oracle-java8-installer=${version} &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&   rm -rf /var/cache/oracle-jdk8-installer
